welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fukui, a charming city known for its rich history, stunning coastline, and traditional craftsmanship. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in its unique culture and natural beauty. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: ヨーロッパ軒 総本店
restaurants.description: ヨーロッパ軒 総本店 is a tonkatsu restaurant located in 福井市.

restaurants.name: Akiyoshi (秋吉 福井駅前店)
restaurants.description: Akiyoshi (秋吉 福井駅前店) is a yakitori restaurant located in 福井市.

restaurants.name: Akiyoshi (秋吉 福井片町店)
restaurants.description: Akiyoshi (秋吉 福井片町店) is a yakitori restaurant located in 福井市.

restaurants.name: 弥吉本店
restaurants.description: 弥吉本店 is a japanese restaurant located in 福井市.

restaurants.name: Imajo Soba (今庄そば)
restaurants.description: Imajo Soba (今庄そば) is a soba restaurant located in 福井市.
restaurants.address: 中央1-1-1 (ハピラインふくい 福井駅構内), 福井市, 福井県, 910-0006

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Fukui Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komatsu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Komatsu Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
